title: JSONScript schema
description: JSONScript script with instructions (generated from template)

anyOf.title: $exec
anyOf.description: call to external object, $exec and $method values should evaluate to a string

anyOf.title: $ref
anyOf.description: data/script from the current script using absolute/relative JSON-pointer expression

anyOf.title: $data
anyOf.description: data from the data instance using JSON-pointer expression, $data value should evalute to a string before the expression is evaluated
scripts in the object are executed in parallel, property names should not start with $
scripts in array are executed sequentially
scalar values are also a valid JSONScript
